channel.title: Help for woodcutter
channel.description:
okay im a noob at scar but i made a script that chops trees so far. I wanted to add a few things and need help. If you help you will be credited for script.
1: i wanted to know how i could make it so tree color is a variable i put on a form
2: how i can make it auto drop logs
3: add antirandom

item.title: Help for woodcutter
item.dc:creator: @Rune_Hacker1 Rune Hacker
item.description:

I donâ€™t need any credit if you want, i just go around helping people with any problems. Glad to hear your almost done with a script you made.

Read full topic

thanks ill give you 50% credit for script for all the help. It should be done in 5 minutes now

item.title: Help for woodcutter
item.dc:creator: @Rune_Hacker1 Rune Hacker
item.description:
@Rune_Hacker1 wrote:

Something like this:

Procedure SetTreeColors; begin case LowerCase(Players[CurrentPlayer].String1) of 'normal' : treecolor := normalcolor; 'oak' : treecolor := oakcolor; 'willow' : treecolor := willowcolor; 'yew' : treecolor := yewcolor; end; end;

Where the editbox is string1, you have const of all the tree colors such as normalcolor, oakcolor, ect. and it will set the treecolor ofof the tree will be cutting

Read full topic

item.title: Help for woodcutter
item.dc:creator: @defd120 defd120
item.description:
@defd120 wrote:

Rune Hacker:

1: Like in an editbox, combobox, or how in the form?

I basically would want it in an edit box and want it to translate oak into the color of oaks

Read full topic

item.title: Help for woodcutter
item.dc:creator: @Rune_Hacker1 Rune Hacker
item.description:
@Rune_Hacker1 wrote:

1: Like in an editbox, combobox, or how in the form?

2: add woodcutting srl in your script with {.include SRL/SRL/skill/WoodCutting.scar} and use the procedure DropAllLogs;

3: add this in all your procedures - FindNormalRandoms;

Read full topic
